name: Doom Farm
description:
lord Chaos has located a minion portal in the middle of a desert and tasked you to harvest minion eggs for his army. The area is secured but be careful, these creatures are known to multiply chaotically when not kept in check...

[TURN ON FULLSCREEN]

-------------------------------------------------------------

Made in a few days by a solo dev as an entry for 
Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
Theme "Let there be chaos"

-----------------HOW-TO-PLAY-----------------------

 - AWSD/arrow keys to move
 - LMB to shoot (3s CD)
 - RMB to activate shield (8s CD)
 - P to pause/unpause game

 - The portal spawns enraged enemies at increasing speed.
 - Your bullets will break eggs, anger normal minions and destroy already angered minions turning them into eggs.
 - Walk over minion eggs to collect them.
 - Eggs will hatch after a while or when destroyed spawning 2 normal minions.
 - Enraged minions will shoot red bullets that can kill you and purple bullets that can break eggs and anger other minions.
 - When using your shield ability you are immune to damage, move at inreased speed and push minions aside.
